729300f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Orange Avenue
729300f-a.text:
606-608 Richmond Avenue, west side, at Orange Avenue,
showing St. Roch's Roman Catholic Church. On the right is
the old church building, a small frame structure.
May 21, 1932
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The old St. Roch's Church, adjoining the
new edifice, seen from the east side of Nicholas Avenue.
May 21, 1932
P. L. Sperr
729300f-a.folder: Richmond Avenue & Orange Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729300f-b.text:
606-608 Richmond Avenue, west side, at Orange Avenue,

729299f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Orange Avenue
729299f-a.text:
587 Richmond Avenue, east side, between Orange
Avenue and Seekman Street, showing the rear of an old
frame house which belonged to Mrs. Martling in 1874 and
to the Captain John Wright Estate in 1898. The view is
north from Orange Avenue.
May 21, 1932
L. Sperr
729299f-a.folder: Richmond Avenue & Orange Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729301f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Orange Avenue
729301f-a.text:
62O Richmond Avenue, west side, between Orange
Avenue and Seymour Avenue. The real estate maps of 1871
and 1898 show the house to have belonged to E. Simonson.
May 21, 1932
P. L. Sperr
